Get your piece. No Strings Attached. Find local promotions and discounts to your favorite restaurants free.
Piece together your local finds. Use your location to access deals just a stone\'s throw away.
Your piece of the pie. Once you find your deal, redemption is simply a click away.
Lets Get Started! It\'s free and easy to use. Sign up with one click by connecting with your facebook account, or using your email address. Already have an account ? Login

CONNECT WITH Google+; CONNECT WITH Facebook; Sign Up; Your Payment Info :; No Credit Info Found; Add Card + ; Location Service; Billing Email Address :; Your Language :; Save; Delete; Payment Info; Name this card (e.g Dads card); Credit Card Number; Cardholder Name; Address Line; Apt#. Floor. P.O Box; City; Email for Payments Receipt; Postal/Zip Code; Thank You !; Head over to My Purchases to View your order; Always remember, you have above time to redeem this deal.; Please see deal details for more info.; This Deal has expired,; you will be able to redeem it again on ; Warning; To redeem this deal, show; this page to the staff member; and they will redeem it.; Once Redeem is pressed, your deal is no longer valid.; CONTINUE; Are you Staff ?; Thank You for your purchase !; Your deal has been redeemed and is no longer valid.; Show Password; Find us on Facebook; Shoot us an email; support@mypiece.co; Give us a call (or text); 514 823 0286; Looks like your plate is empty.; Visit our homepage to make a purchase.; This Deal is no longer valid and cannot be redeemed.; Please contact us if you have any questions.; Quick Tip; Each purchase may only be; redeemed once Do not show me this again; We are cooking up some deals right now, and they will be ready on ;
With over 100+ restaurants in the Montreal Downtown area, finding great food at even better prices has never been so easy.;
We have done a lot to make sure you find the best deals around you easily.;
It\'s simple; turn on your location services in your account settings and we will find the closest deals to you.;
Save time with secure mobile payments so you can get to; what\'s important - enjoying your food !; Remember you can only redeem each purchase ONE TIME !;
That means if you order 30 subs in one purchase, buckle your seatbelts because you must redeem the whole purchase at the same time !;
